page.title: 17A day in my Life.
page.content: First my alarm wakes me up at 8.00 in the morning. I get washed and dressed and go down stairs for breakfast. I have "Frosties" for my cereal and toast with honey. Next I go upstairs to clean my teeth. I put my coat and shoes on and get in the car. We get to Stokenham School at nine o'clock. I go out to play until half past nine. When we come in we have the register then we go into Assembly. After Assembly we read for ten minutes then we go to watch T.V. After that we go out to play. After play we work. At 12.15 we go for our lunch and then play until 1.30. Today we got some paper and a drawing board and went outside and drew part of the school. At 2.45 we came back and went out to play then we had music. We went home at 4.00 and I watched T.V. After tea I went out to play with my friends until bedtime.
